00025 #define IS_YUV400_FRAME(colorspace) \
00026     (COLORSPACE_E_YUV400 == (colorspace))
00027 
00028 #define IS_YUV420_FRAME(colorspace)\
00029     (COLORSPACE_E_IYUV == (colorspace) \
00030     || COLORSPACE_E_YV12 == (colorspace))
00031 
00032 #define IS_YUV422_FRAME(colorspace) \
00033     (COLORSPACE_E_YUY2 == (colorspace) \
00034     || COLORSPACE_E_UYVY == (colorspace) \
00035     || COLORSPACE_E_YVYU   == (colorspace) \
00036     || COLORSPACE_E_YUV422 == (colorspace))
00037 
00038 #define IS_RGB_FRAME(colorspace) \
00039     (COLORSPACE_E_RGB555 == (colorspace) \
00040     || COLORSPACE_E_RGB565 == (colorspace) \
00041     || COLORSPACE_E_RGB24  == (colorspace) \
00042     || COLORSPACE_E_RGB32  == (colorspace))

00131 typedef enum noise_level_e
00132 {
00133     N_NONE            = 0,
00134     WEAK              = 1,
00135     MODERATE          = 2,
00136     MIDDLE            = 3,
00137     STRONG            = 4,
00138     VERY_STRONG       = 5,         // ! corrupts high-motion sequences
00139     HARD              = 6, // ! corrupts high-motion sequences
00140     NOISE_LEVEL_TOTAL = 6
